caption: WORSE SERVICE AND PIZZA!!! DO NOT COME HERE YOU WILL BE DISSAPOINTED
The best pizza in Miami. I've tried a few and really the pie you'll get here beats the rest. Will eat here again during my next winter vacation out of NYC.

My favorite pizza in Brickell. Amazing service and super tasty cocktails at their bar. Great place to go for a quick drink and stay for four more and a pie! The ‘hot box’ cocktail is particularly good.
Great Food
$7 delivery fee through their own app? GFY!
It is a rip off. $16 for a small Moscow mule + tax + 20% tip (not even in a copper mug) AND the bartender stopped wearing a mask as the night progressed.

No complaints about the food, I actually enjoyed it very much. I give this place two stars because I had a terrible experience with the waitress who arbitrarily tipped herself 25% without our consent. This is unethical behavior from the staff of this place.
Great atmosphere, great food, outstanding service.  IF you have one thing there order the meat balls, like a Tony the Tiger says; "they're great"! And this from a New Yorker
Excellent everything.

The service and food overall is great. But, just in time to ruin a great dinner, apparently the lady who is the manager (dyed red hair woman with extra attitude) quick us out of the restaurant as soon as we paid the bill. We still had a cup …

Really great pizza.   There are a lot of choices in Brickell, but I think I like here the best.  Perfect crust, right amount of sauce and cheese.  If you want some kind of fusion pizza with feta cheese and dragon fruit look elsewhere.  If …

While the pizza is amazing the wait time is absolutely ridiculous. I ordered over an hour ago for pick up. The app said my food would be ready at approximately 7:51. I decided to walk over at 8:20 pizza still not ready and was just going in …
Excellent wings - juicy and large
Always late and cold

(Translated by Google) I came to this place to pick up an order from Uber eats and a woman with a cap from the restaurant "Dc pie" told me to go out aggressively because supposedly I was in an area where you should not wait and she decided …
(Translated by Google) It is magnificent  (Original) Es magnifico

I ordered, and no food ever came.  I waited 1/2 hour for my salad.  I paid for my beverage and left.  No apologies, etc.   bare menu selection.  Shake shack around the corner was a much better choice.  I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS DUMP!
Friend Order a simple pizza and wings and order took almost 2 hours for delivery on a Monday.  Terrible service. It’s 1 mile from where we live
Very good pizza. I need to return and try other dishes.  Great ambiance 👍🏼
Service was splendid! We try the pear salad, hot wings and a pie!
At least half of the pizza was just bread. Overpriced compared to other pizza places in Brickell. Great atmosphere though.

(Translated by Google) Pizza 🍕 for 5 plus! The dough is thin, crispy, the atmosphere is cool, the waiters are polite and pleasant!  We will definitely come again !!  Really tasty pizza !!!  (Original) Пицца 🍕 на 5 с плюсом! Тесто тонкое, …

Ratings should be in the high 4's. Pizza is amazing NY style. We also had the salad and ravioli which were great too. The pizza is some of the best I've had in all of Florida. Thin, crispy, and cheesy. Will definitely be back

Very tasty pizza despite the fact that the restaurant calls it "pie". They lost my order, but I am not going to take off any stars because it was on New Year Eve, and the amount of orders they received was staggering. When they found out, they fixed it right away, and in 10 minutes I was eating my pie. Thank you. Recommend.

I celebrated my graduation this evening in this great place. Well it was a fabulous evening and the restaurant was undoubtedly one of the reasons for this fruitful celebration. The team  participated in a pleasant manner, the cuisine was …

very bad experience when ordering two 15 ”pizzas to go and found that half of the circle was just bread, with no tomato or cheese!  very frustrating and even more to call and claim and nobody is responsible for that!

I had the best time at DC PIE CO. as soon as we got there the music was on point. It totally changed my mood. I ordered a spicy margarita and the kale Caesar salad to start. So good! We shared a veggie pizza and it was honestly the best …

Wasn’t sure what to expect but the pizza was pretty good and the service was excellent. As basic as the kale Caesar was, it was great. One complaint is toppings selection. How does a pizza place not have black olives, prosciutto, nor anchovies? Break my heart.

I will surely bring my family and friends here to taste your bestsellers. For me, you deserve to get high satisfaction ratings coming from your customers. You are the best, guys! Strongly recommended!
Great wings, good happy hour prices! And great cocktails!
We love the wings here-best we've ever had! Great drinks too!

Nice, chill spot off the beaten path of brickell. The pizza was ok, the wings were great (although may be too sweet for some), and the drinks were decently strong. They have a nice happy hour where 2 select cocktails, wine and beer are half …
This place has the best pizza in the Bay area,  the last time I was there the service was very fast and the food as always was delicious
The Margherita and Nutella pizzas here are to die for!

Ordered this from a delivery service. Food was ICE COLD. Ravioli were absolutely disgusting. Meatballs ok, pizza ok, but nowhere close to the surrounding pizzas in the neighborhood. Decent flavor but the  dough was rock hard. The saviors to …

Highly request doing more than just walking by. We’ve been wanting to try, living just next door. It’s the perfect Friday date night spot - just enough to feel like you went out and did something, but didn’t go over the top. Wings are a hit! Will be back. Ask for Chris! Killing it on his second day.

We use to order a long time ago from them, we had first issue that when you order by phone they pick up the phone and they just let you wait and never pick up again and that wasn’t once so I went there to pick up the pizza and I complained …
Pizza is best in miami but they really need to work on their drinks. $10 glass of wine for not even a quarter of a glass.
Worth the waiting in a line. Pizza is fresh and yummy!!! :)

We really love their pizza, but every time we try to place an order for pick up they take forever to pick up the phone and in many occasions we’ve had to wait over 20 minutes after the time it’s supposed to be ready in order to get the pizza. Hopefully they can improve their delivery/takeout logistics.

Pizza is amazing, but it’s really tough to order for delivery OR pick up. We live nearby so have given up trying to get delivery (it takes so long that the drivers assigned to pick it up typically give up and unassign themselves), so we …
It's lit 🤷

The atmosphere and general helpfulness of the staff is exceptional for a restaurant that mainly focuses on pizza. It has a great ambiance, given the fact that the entire dining area is centered around the pizza oven. The combination of …

I REALLY hate to give this review because I DO love the food, the outdoor seating and the staff.  HOWEVER....  Literally half the time I call-in an order for pick-up I am told the food will be ready in 20-30 minutes.  But when I arrive …

And I’m giving you one star because I can’t give you zero! OMG, Never again I’ll order from this place!!! I made an order by Uber eats and it was supposed to be ready at 9:10 pm after that I received a notice that it was supposed to be …

Ryan was rude, condescending and disrespectful. As a customer who’s eaten there before, I had a horrible experience going back and doing a delivery for them. The orders I was assigned were refused to me because I asked why it was going to …
They offer 15% off if you come and pick it up, but you MUST ask for it. Ordered pick up and waited around 40 minutes for it to be ready.  Won’t be returning.

Pizza is great, too bad the management just cannot get their operation  working properly. Whether on take-out or dine in, they are always taking way toooo long to deliver the food.  I am not exaggerating, believe me, I tried ordering from …

My husband and I ordered from here as a break from cooking and mind you we don’t need to be spending money during these times but wanted to support.  They said they would rush it and it took 20 min over the time.  I am a pizza fan but when …
Seems like a joke what they offer. Low quality food, tiny servings and a bad service. Oh I forgot how expensive it was..
Great Pizza and amazing chicken wings!
The food is great but I came in with a group of 8 people. 4 groups came later and the server took our order after the 4 groups. Food didn’t come out until 40 minutes later.
Great pizza & salads from the same formula as Lucali.
very nice location and delicious pizza
Good food 👍👌
I know this is a pizza place but i’ve been here 3 times already for the wings alone.😋
Seriously? It’s just not good....
Quick and friendly service with delicious pizza. My husband and I appreciated the fresh ingredients.

I live two blocks from there so I’ve picked up pizza and wings and the second time just pizza.  As another poster mentioned, strange that there are no olives, and with a dollar tip, the standard pizza with two toppings was $23-24, but it’s …
Need to be honest, really good pizza! I am ordering every Friday as part of my pizza Friday tradition, my fav one has mushrooms and extra basil 🍕❤️

Usually when I go to a place and am not fully satisfied with the food I start the review talking about the staff, lol.  The interior is nicely decorated with a rustic look.  The staff were great.  Greeted at the door by thE host, the …
Mad decent

Unless you enjoy waiting for an absurd amount of time for a VERY limited seat establishment you’re better off going to North Italia or Mister01 (IMO). The staff is very rude and they are clearly overwhelmed and under staffed. I suspect they …
Wanted to like this place but the pizza tastes like a cracker with melted Parmesan. As others have stated, many better options in the area.
Went for a business lunch. Service was excellent - From the hostess to the server to the bar manager.  Salad and wings were very good.   Pepperoni chips are a must. Look forward to going back

I personally think this is the best pizza in brickell. I've been stopping in here now once a week to get pizza and the eggplant parm. The wings are fantastic but the eggplant parm is a must. Very happy they moved into the neighborhood and I wish them many successful years in the future.

Love it! It's my new to go place for weekly pizza! =) The wait for the pizza is a bit long, so make sure to get some appetizer for the table.. The pepperoni chips and the artichokes are to die for! Stefany is amazing!
Food and service were on point

So I have had mixed feelings about DC PIE CO.I live next door and my first visit didn’t go so well.The food was great but the service was lacking.Granted it had just opened.I was hesitant to go back but when I finally caved I didn’t regret it.They definitely won me back.
Brickell has been increasing their pizza options and I'm a huge fan. Definitely top five on my list and I eat pizza every other day.
Two words: Pepperoni Chips !!
The first time I came here was during opening week and I had a bad experience with the service. Tried it again yesterday and really happy management picked it up. Keep it up.
Excellent customer service.
Love the pizza and the vibe there. Brickell needed a place like this.

New pizza+ place in Brickell. Ingredients are very fresh, literally you can watch them slice the veggies prior to being placed on your pie. All day Happy Hour on select drinks is a fun way to enjoy a “cheap” drink too. The eggplant parm was amazing, the pizza was great.
Great taste
🔥🔥🔥 pizza, wings, and meatballs, oh and the eggplant parmesan 😍😍😍 great staff and management was extremely hospitable.
Good pizza, the food took long but well worth it.
A "pizza" place that doesn't have olives, hot sauce or any real good item on the menu. All flash no substance. Don't waste your time there.

Service and decor are fine. The rose wine was not chilled enough but I am still ok with that, it can be fixed . Pepperoni chips were just either burn or not cooked ( see picture). But I go to a pizza place for a pizza and what a …
Service was amazing. Food was absolutely scrumptious; we ate pizza, calzone, pepperoni chips  meatballs, wings and Nutella calzone. DC PIE CO is a  WOW all around can’t wait to go go back 🤩🍕😋
Contender for the best pizza in Miami! This is a spin off from Lucali in South Beach. The wait staff is also top notch.
Would absolutely recommend this pizza to anyone in Miami! Very friendly staff and most importantly, the food is delicious!

Ay dios mio! How is this place open?!?! If I could leave negative stars I would. The reviews below cannot be real. I dined last night with my partner for the first and last time. NO EXAGGERATION our two pizzas took almost two hours. When no …
Some Za for lunch very sick. More of a deep dish kinda dude, but this was pretty good. Very good amount of basil

Just went for drinks at the cool little bar in the back -- outstanding. Drinks made by Bruno are "crafted" more than mixed. He takes real pride in his creations and it showed/tasted like it. The people were incredibly friendly, and we tried …
Average pizza. Long wait time.
good pizza, but WAY overpriced for what you get. It's pretty good pizza, but Miami is a growing city full of "pretty good" pizza options. The price disparity here needs to be addressed.
Great Food, Great environment, and great people. Pizza and wings are delicious 😋

Awesome awesome awesome . Food is 12 out of 10 only to be outdone by the service there . Staff is really well trained , knowledgeable and friendly . The wings are a can’t - miss and add some garlic and basil to that pie. Only smiling faces from the guests at the restaurant which tells you something
Awesome pizza and meatballs ! Right on brickell  - by city center - delicious!
Finally, a great pizza with great service.  The pepperoni chips are good but the wings are best in class.  Will go back ASAP
Awesome experience. Best service in Miami.

Beyond excited that I basically have Lucali just a few minutes from the house now. The restaurant is spacious and beautifully decorated with an open area to view the pizza makers and rotating Neapolitan oven. There are a few outdoor tables …

While DC Pie needs a little time to work on time management since their opening, it's clear their staff is working hard to get things right. When I had a small issue on my first visit, their Managing Partner Mary and Bar Manager Ryan were …
Omg this place is amaze
Best pizza and chicken wings in tho Brickell area.  Also good Happy Hour.  Plus we had a great waiter.

Being from Queens I’m pretty skeptical about trying pizza anywhere outside of NYC. However I was visiting a friend in Miami and he suggested we check out DC Pie Co in Brickell because they’re Brooklyn style pizza. 10/10 for the staff and …
What a rip-off... The prices are insane for what this place is and has to offer. The food and service are just terrible. Save your money!
100% disappointed... Small plates, bad drinks... Much better places around, would not recommended it or even go back again

Appetizer was burned, small plates when the menu says for two people, cocktail of mezcal and Jalapeño was horrible and at the end they include the tip and they don’t even ask you Definitively wont go back

Disappointing. Ordered to go. Twice the quoted time. Cold when I got it. Lots of confused staff. Seemed overwhelmed on a night with a half empty room. Hoping they are just still working out the new restaurant kinks. Will try again in a month or so.

I’m really picky about pizza coming from Pittsburgh, yes there’s amazing pizza and other cuisines in Pittsburgh. Enough about Pittsbrugh DC Pie has good pizza, and probably the best in Brickell.  The vibe and scene is pretty cool. The bar …
Great ambiance Great food Great Drinks Great Scene Great partnership Mary is going to kill it All the best
My favorite pizza restaurant yet very close to my house! The best meatballs and traditional Margarita pizza. Beautiful cozy place, very well decorated. Highly recommended!
The food was ok but super expensive for a pizza place. The worst thing they pass our cards two times for the same amount so we paid for 4 pizza 450$.  They are  thiefs!

Loving the vibe and great customer service. The bar is the back had excellent choices for fresh cocktails. The pizza was very tasty 😋. The service was a little slow, but I wasn't in a rush. I had to enjoy the moment. Im sure they will work out the kinks as they progress.

Only reason I’m not leaving one star is because the bar tenders in the back were very polite.  Came here for the first time today and was told that the wait would be ten minutes and that if we liked, we could hang out at the bar in the …
Food is amazing, and the atmosphere is great, but the services was SO SLOW! It took the food over 35 minutes to arrive, and over 15 minutes for the check...

Went one of the first days they opened, took a little longer than it was supposed to but staff was super nice and helpful (always hard opening a new place, gonna happen). Most important the food is unbelievable and with a friendly staff this place should hopefully be around for years to come!
Food was fine but service wasn’t good

The best pizza in town with amazing atmosphere, great cocktails, variety of salads and protein. Great customer service and cool design. There’s a bar called Dom’s right next to DC Pie. If you are looking for great food and cool vibe definitely check this place out! Food here is really amazing! Highly recommend to visit!
Great food, chill ambience. Carlos and Eric were friendly and great.
Solid place.  Great vibe, delicious cocktails and awesome food

The food is delicious and favorable. I REALLY REALLY 💘 the salad, chicken and ravioli. I would recommend people to go & enjoy the experience. Oh! The staff is very pleasant and easy going. Give them a try!!!
